headline: Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) Misses Q4 CY2025 Revenue Estimates, Stock Drops
summary: Healthcare product and device company Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025 as sales rose 4.4% year on year to $11.46 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.50 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) Misses Q4 CY2025 Revenue Estimates, Stock Drops
content.summary: Healthcare product and device company Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025 as sales rose 4.4% year on year to $11.46 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.50 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Abbott misses quarterly revenue estimates on weakness in diagnostics, nutrition
summary: Jan 22 (Reuters) - Abbott missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, hit by weakness in its diagnostic and nutrition business.

content.title: Abbott misses quarterly revenue estimates on weakness in diagnostics, nutrition

headline: Abbott: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of $1.50 per share. The maker of infant formula, medical devices and drugs posted revenue of $11.46 billion in the period, which fell short of Street forecasts. Nine analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $11.78 billion.

content.title: Abbott: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of $1.50 per share. headline: Abbott falls as fourth quarter revenue misses expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) reported fourth-quarter earnings that met expectations but missed on revenue, sending shares down 4.8% as investors reacted to the shortfall and weaker-than-expected first quarter guidance.

content.title: Abbott falls as fourth quarter revenue misses expectations
content.summary: Investing.com -- Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) reported fourth-quarter earnings that met expectations but missed on revenue, sending shares down 4.8% as investors reacted to the shortfall and weaker-than-expected first quarter guidance.

headline: Abbott Stock Slumps on Earnings. What’s Weighing on the Medical Devices Maker.
summary: Shares of  Abbott Laboratories  tumbled Thursday after the medical devices maker posted fourth-quarter earnings and sales that underwhelmed Wall Street.  The company said it expects adjusted earnings in the range of $5.55 to $5.80 a share for the full year.  Abbott also is targeting full-year organic sales growth of between 6.5% to 7.5%.

content.title: Abbott Stock Slumps on Earnings. What’s Weighing on the Medical Devices Maker.
content.summary: Shares of  Abbott Laboratories  tumbled Thursday after the medical devices maker posted fourth-quarter earnings and sales that underwhelmed Wall Street.  The company said it expects adjusted earnings in the range of $5.55 to $5.80 a share for the full year.  Abbott also is targeting full-year organic sales growth of between 6.5% to 7.5%.

headline: GE Aerospace stock slumps, Abbott falls on Q4 sales, Mobileye's guidance
summary: Morning Brief Host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including GE Aerospace (GE) shares slumping in Thursday's premarket trading, Abbott Laboratories' (ABT) stock reaction to its weak fourth quarter sales results, and Mobileye Global (MBLY) issuing weak guidance amid tariff headwinds for automakers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Abbott (ABT) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Mike Comilla: With me today are Robert Ford, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, and Philip Boudreau, Executive Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer.  Abbott Laboratories cautions that these forward-looking statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results to differ materially from those indicated in the forward-looking statements.  Economic, competitive, governmental, technological, and other factors that may affect Abbott Laboratories' operations are discussed in item one a Risk Factors, to our annual report on Form 10-Ks for the year ended 12/31/2024.

content.title: Abbott (ABT) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
content.summary: Mike Comilla: With me today are Robert Ford, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, and Philip Boudreau, Executive Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer.  Abbott Laboratories cautions that these forward-looking statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results to differ materially from those indicated in the forward-looking statements.  Economic, competitive, governmental, technological, and other factors that may affect Abbott Laboratories' operations are discussed in item one a Risk Factors, to our annual report on Form 10-Ks for the year ended 12/31/2024.

headline: Abbott Stock Drops on Slumping Sales of Baby Formula and Nutrition Shakes
summary: Abbott Laboratories stock fell Thursday after the medical-products maker reporting disappointing results, hit by a slump in the division that makes baby formula and nutrition shakes. Fourth-quarter sales in the nutrition business, which includes Similac baby formula and Ensure drinks, dropped 8.

content.title: Abbott Stock Drops on Slumping Sales of Baby Formula and Nutrition Shakes
content.summary: Abbott Laboratories stock fell Thursday after the medical-products maker reporting disappointing results, hit by a slump in the division that makes baby formula and nutrition shakes. Fourth-quarter sales in the nutrition business, which includes Similac baby formula and Ensure drinks, dropped 8.
